ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 Jan 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:

> I'm probably going to get the more evil half of the guild to
> attempt to break-in and rock the bard guild house. See what
> turns up. Has anyone done this yet? I know it was suggested
> by someone else a while back.

http://cazic.cornerzone.com/ubb/Forum1/HTML/000598.html

Vigro (necro in mention) is in my guild. He has hunted bards for a number
of levels now from Marsheart's Chords. They drop regular mandolins.

I have withheld Vigro's weekly ration of Ginesh until he has amended his
ways.

Athren
